meanings.definition: Coming at the end of a series.
meanings.sent1: The final chapter of the book tied up all the loose ends.
meanings.sent2: The final decision was made after much discussion.
meanings.sent3: The final piece of the puzzle was found under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The final moments of the movie left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent5: The final countdown to midnight began as the New Year approached.

meanings.definition: The last examination or contest in a series.
meanings.sent1: She studied hard for the final and felt prepared.
meanings.sent2: The final will determine who wins the championship.
meanings.sent3: The final turned out to be easier than expected, much to everyone's relief.
meanings.sent4: The final was like a battle of wits between the top two students.
meanings.sent5: The final was the ultimate test of their knowledge and skills.

meanings.definition: The last or most important part of something.
meanings.sent1: The final of the movie revealed the true villain.
meanings.sent2: The final of the recipe is adding the secret ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The final of the song had everyone clapping and cheering.
meanings.sent4: The final of the presentation left a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The final of the project showcased their hard work and dedication.
